name: A2V Badminton Academy
description: A2V Badminton Academy offers indoor badminton courts in Rajajinagar, Bengaluru. Located on the 5th floor of Bindu Galaxy, it provides a safe and flexible play environment with rental gear, changing rooms, and easy court booking for players of all levels.
